name: NecroLove
description:
A game about surviving the zombie apocalypse by finding love...in Zombies. Play through a zombie dating simulation to find your brain eating soul mate.

Things I have done for this project:

  • Created scripts that performs card matching
  • Created script that performed visual novel aspects with choices select
  • Created game play music listed below
    • https://drive.google.com/open?id=1tQd83a4Uz3SlllA2B0irXLgWdqwa8KFK
    • https://drive.google.com/open?id=1mpQtxmdLG13cpebUDVS_7m7dT4OBLPtF
